mapper.select: SELECT D.DRINK_NO, D.NAME, D.NEW_PRODUCT, D.SEASON, D.category_ID, i.URL, ds.category_name, c.Kcal, c.sodium, c.SAT_FAT, c.sugars, c.protein, c.caffeine FROM drink_product D LEFT JOIN IMG i ON D.DRINK_NO = i.drink_no LEFT JOIN drink_category ds ON D.category_ID = ds.category_ID LEFT JOIN contain c ON D.drink_no = c.drink_no
